org.sd.text.lucene
Class RollingLuceneStore

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.util.RollingStore<org.apache.lucene.document.Document>
      org.sd.text.lucene.RollingLuceneStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClusterRollingLuceneStore
public abstract class RollingLuceneStore
extends RollingStore<org.apache.lucene.document.Document>

LuceneStore that 'rolls' over at a document limit.

Author:
Spence Koehler

addIndex

public int addIndex(java.io.File store)
             throws java.io.IOException
Add all the documents in the store to this index.

Returns:
the number of rolls(indicating number of new index shards created) performed from adding the index
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if unable to convert a retrieved document to an indexable document.
java.io.IOException
